column5: Talked with Remi at AWO last night. Advised still 3 feet of snow in the bush. He was still ice fishing on Sunday. Used all of auger to get to soft water.
I'm glad we're not hitting Meta Lake until August! It should be melted by then...I hope. lol
Dave, talked to Brace Lake, Same ice as last year at this time, and the opener should be ok as it was last year.Juls, what week in Aug are you going?
I drilled a hole on lower twin lake, a few miles east of Nakina, today and had 19 inches and the first 4 I could scrape away with my boots. Should be fine.
Received an email today informing me the flights out of Nakina for opening week are canceled. Have not been able to confirm this as of this time

Looks like it is going to be in the 50's and 60's up there this week with chances of rain towards the end of the week, above freezing every night with the expception of one. It might be too little too late but it sure will help. http://weather.gc.ca/city/pages/on-97_metric_e.html
